div.h3: Governor Whitmer has ordered the closure of all pre-K to 12 schools in the State of Michigan.

div.p: Sparta Area Schools will continue to offer breakfast and lunch during this period of school closure. We will provide a sack breakfast and lunch for any children 18 years or younger. Meals will be provided for all 7 days each week, which will be distributed on Tuesdays and Fridays at the locations and times listed below:
Sparta High School Main Entrance - 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM
Balyeat Field Parking Lot - 10:15 AM - 10:45 AM
Sparta Baptist Church Parking Lot - 11:00 AM - 11:30 AM
Trinity Lutheran Church Parking Lot - 11:00 AM - 11:30 AM
Algoma Township Sports Park - Algoma Parking Lot - 10:15 AM - 10:45 AM
Riverview Mobile Park Home Playground - 11:00 AM - 11:30 AM
Parkwood Green Village Community Center - 10:15 AM - 10:45 AM
Glenwood Mobile Home Park - 11:00 AM - 11:30 AM
